statements: SELECT * FROM HighPotentialEmployees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT name, performance_rating FROM HighPotentialEmployees WHERE career_progression = 'Promoted';
SELECT employee_id, name FROM HighPotentialEmployees WHERE performance_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM HighPotentialEmployees WHERE career_progression = 'On track' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT name, career_progression FROM HighPotentialEmployees WHERE performance_rating < 3.0;
SELECT * FROM HighPotentialEmployees WHERE performance_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, performance_rating FROM HighPotentialEmployees WHERE career_progression = 'Senior' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT name, career_progression FROM HighPotentialEmployees WHERE performance_rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0 ORDER BY career_progression, name;
SELECT * FROM HighPotentialEmployees WHERE performance_rating < 3.0 OR career_progression = 'Junior' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT MAX(performance_rating) AS highest_performance_rating, MIN(performance_rating) AS lowest_performance_rating FROM HighPotentialEmployees;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM career_progression WHERE employee_id = 12345;
SELECT progression_id, new_position, promotion_date FROM career_progression ORDER BY promotion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM career_progression WHERE promotion_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' AND position LIKE 'Associate%';
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE status = 'In Progress'
SELECT employee_id, name, hire_date, performance_score FROM employees ORDER BY performance_score DESC
SELECT promotion_date, new_role, employee_id FROM promotions ORDER BY promotion_date
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT name, department, performance_score FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, name, hire_date, salary FROM employees WHERE performance_score >= 4.5 ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, department, hire_date, performance_score FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing' AND salary < 75000;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE promotion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, job_title FROM CareerProgression ORDER BY job_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC, hire_date ASC
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department='Sales'
SELECT e.employee_name, p.metric_name, p.metric_value FROM Employees e INNER JOIN PerformanceMetrics p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id
SELECT e.employee_name, c.job_title, c.promotion_date FROM Employees e INNER JOIN CareerProgression c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id WHERE c.promotion_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT e.employee_name, p.potential_score, p.assessment_date FROM Employees e INNER JOIN PotentialEmployees p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department='Sales';
SELECT employee_id, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, department, position FROM employees WHERE department='HR' AND position='Manager';
SELECT employee_id, name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT e.name, p.performance_rating, c.new_position FROM employees e JOIN performance_metrics p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id JOIN career_progression c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id WHERE p.performance_rating >= 4;
SELECT e.name, t.training_type, t.training_date FROM employees e JOIN training_records t ON e.employee_id = t.employee_id WHERE t.duration_hours > 10;
SELECT h.employee_id, e.name, h.potential_score, h.identified_date FROM high_potential_employees h JOIN employees e ON h.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE h.potential_score >= 8;
